#
# File generated by CMakeBuilder
#
#

cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 2.8 )

PROJECT ( get_click_points CXX )

FIND_PACKAGE( OpenCV REQUIRED)
FIND_PACKAGE( Boost REQUIRED COMPONENTS filesystem system)

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})

ADD_EXECUTABLE ( bin/get_points_img get_points_img.cpp )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( bin/get_points_img ${OpenCV_LIBS} ${Boost_LIBRARIES} )

ADD_EXECUTABLE ( bin/get_points_vid get_points_vid.cpp )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( bin/get_points_vid ${OpenCV_LIBS} ${Boost_LIBRARIES} )
